p: There are clear indications that PeV-A circulates worldwide as it was detected in approximately 2% of specimens collected from children with a clinical suspicion of viral infections or as part of the national EV surveillance programs in Japan, Hong Kong, Denmark, Finland, the Netherlands, and the USA [ 14, 15, 38, 39, 40, 41, 42, 43].
